job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongFlex Payroll is looking for a software engineer to join our energetic team This high performing group follows an Agile methodology working together to get through though challenges and allowing the team to succeed This full stack team works on a range of efforts within our Flex Client Facing application space Tasks are assigned requiring skills in design SQL Java JavaScript Incidents andor anything in between No worries if you are not an expert in everything we focus on growing bench strength in everyone so there are no silos or dependencies on SMEsbrulliAs an engineer you should know about full stack development in the web space This includes Oracle Java Javascript HTMLCSS along with webservices and OpenshiftliliWe are also using Angular but will be moving to REACT as an example that means adaptability is a must since change never stops in the Java and Web spaceliliOther technical areas involved are Mongo Kafka Openshift Webservices Splunk AppDynamics Appd GIT Intellij Jenkins ECS Mobile development and continuous deploymentsliliGreat communication leadership skills in mentoring and a team playerliliCreativity innovation and the ability to help with efforts in Continuous Delivery spaceliliOur developers participate in all levels of software development from high level tshirt estimating design documents reviews architecture reviews Release Planning active development and testing deployment and supportliul strongRequirementsbrstrongulliBachelors Degree in Computerrelated discipline or equivalent work experienceliliExpertise in SQL JAVA and JavascriptliliBut most importantly be supportive and a role model of our Paychex ValuesliliIntegrity Service Innovation Partnership Accountable RespectbrliulstrongOur CommitmentbrbrstrongPaychex is dedicated to fostering a culture of intentional Inclusion and Diversity IampD Our valued employees and commitment to IampD is the essence of our internal and external success Inclusivity is a key value of our corporate culture and is exemplified through our reputation as a top employer for employee development diversity and ethics as well as a focus on fairness in recruitment selection and decision makingbrbrClick here for more information on our corporate social responsibility
